history: Thank you. We can learn from each other.
php5.3以下已经不多见了，不过还是谢谢分享，学到了 EDIT: English translation (from Chinese) by @ricksanchez: PHP version 5.3 is kinda rare nowadays but thank you for sharing it. I learned something
